sentences.sCn: 一个马铃薯大约有90卡路里的热量。

sentences.sContent: I need to burn off a few calories (= lose some weight by exercising ) .
sentences.sCn: 我要消耗掉一些卡路里。

sentences.sContent: My wife convinced me to finally start counting calories (= control my weight by being careful about what I eat ) .
sentences.sCn: 我妻子终于说服我开始计算卡路里、控制体重。

phrases.pCn: 卡路里摄入量；热量摄取

trans.tranOther: a unit for measuring the amount of  energy  that food will produce
